NEW: WE ARE NOW OFFERING YOU THE CHOICE OF cPANEL or DIRECTADMIN ​

With our premium SSD based storage coupled with super high spec servers, we can guarantee your website running at blazing speeds! Sign up today and you'll be up and running in no time with one of our shared hosting solutions!

We are offering a 50% recurring discount for life with no price rises! Simply use the code JULY50% at signup to claim!

As standard pay for 1 year get 2 months free, pay for 2 years get 4 months free, pay for 3 years get 6 months free (free months reflected in discounted pricing!)

If you have any questions please do get in touch with our sales team at sales@sharedspace.io

All hosting packages come with a 30 day moneyback guarantee! But we're sure you'll be happy with us ! We also backup all sites to secure cloud storage!

Available locations: Dallas TX
